main.name: Sergei Vorobev
main.occupation: Full-Stack Web Developer & Django Developer & Python Developer & Backend Developer
main.bio:
Backend software developer with a degree in computer science. Over last 5 years I have gathered experience in many software projects including:
• Venue app to search for events, as well as to create your own events and meetings. • Web weather service to visualize weather data using Raspberry Pi, IoT sensors, SQLite and Python. • Energy expenditure for running to analysis of energy expenditure for running. • Assets price prediction to predict the closing assets price with the 60 day assets price. • Health awareness system web application illustrates personal medical data, educate a user about healthy food (study materials, quiz) and makes a prediction about the risk of increasing glucose in the blood.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: My favorite programming language is Python, framework: Django. My ambition is to continue my growth in web application development. I am familiar with agile project management methodologies. I did most of my development with SCRAM methodology.

education.description: The most significant project along my study was a web-based weather service created with a Raspberry Pi, Python, SQLite and Flask web framework. Diploma Thesis: Web weather service.

projects.title: Web weather service
projects.category: The weather station and web application for data visualisation that is the subject of this engineering paper is implemented as part of an individual engineering project by the author of this research.

projects.category: This project makes analysis of energy expenditure for running.

projects.title: Health awareness system
projects.category: The main purpose of the project(web application) informing the user about healthy eating, illustrating personal data with glucose levels, weight, BMI. In addition, the application prompts the user to review educational materials and take a quiz, as well as analyses the user's answers and makes a prediction about the risk of increasing blood glucose levels.

projects.category: This program predicts the closing assets price using artifitial recurrent neural network called Long Sort Term Memory(LSTM) with the 60 day assets price.

projects.category: This program analyzes the change in the asset over time and determines the best time to buy and sell using the SMA price intersection method.
